question: I take out all the clothes while bathing then I do wadhu .So can I perform namaz directly with that wadhu or I will have to do wadhu again after I put on the clothes.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
There is no need to make Wudhu after taking a bath. The limbs of Wudhu are washed during bathing.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
